message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this valuable product to you for $95. I think it's a great deal for something of this quality.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. How about we split the difference and settle at $90?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit higher on the price. Would you be willing to meet me at $82?
Bob, I'm trying to be fair here. $82 is really pushing my bottom line.  Would you consider meeting me halfway at $86? It's my final offer.
